### **Why GhostData?**  
Every time you share a **photo, PDF, video, or audio file**, you might be sharing **more than you think**. Hidden inside your files is **metadata**â€”information like:  
âœ” **Your location (GPS coordinates from photos & videos)**  
âœ” **Device details (camera model, software version, recording device info)**  
âœ” **Timestamps (when and where the file was created/edited)**  
âœ” **Author names & hidden document history in PDFs**  
âœ” **Hidden media properties in audio & video files**  

This data can be **misused**, exposing personal details or even tracking your movements. **GhostData** ensures your files are **clean, anonymous, and safe to share.**  

---

### **How GhostData Works**  
GhostData is a **lightweight, easy-to-use SDK** that removes metadata from:  
âœ… **Images (JPEG, PNG)** â€“ Strips GPS, camera details, and timestamps.  
âœ… **PDFs** â€“ Wipes out hidden author names, document history, and more.  
âœ… **Videos (MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV)** â€“ Removes GPS data, timestamps, and embedded creator info.  
âœ… **Audio Files (MP3)** â€“ Clears hidden tags, author names, and unnecessary metadata.  

ğŸ’¡ **Your files stay local** â€“ No uploads, no tracking, just **instant privacy.**  

---

### **Features**  
âœ” **Fast & Lightweight** â€“ No complex setup, works instantly.  
âœ” **Privacy-First** â€“ No data storage, no tracking.  
âœ” **Works Offline** â€“ No internet required, perfect for secure environments.  
âœ” **Easy Integration** â€“ Works with Python, Flask, and CLI tools.  
âœ” **Supports Images, PDFs, Videos, and Audio Files.**  

---

### **Installation**  
First, install GhostData:  
```bash
pip install ghostdata
```

### **Usage Example**  
```python
from ghostdata.cleaner import GhostData

# Remove metadata from an image
GhostData.clean("photo.jpg")

# Remove metadata from a PDF
GhostData.clean("document.pdf")

# Remove metadata from a video
GhostData.clean("video.mp4")

# Remove metadata from an audio file
GhostData.clean("audio.mp3")
```
